infoSection.title: What is ESCO?
infoSection.description: The European classification of skills, competencies, qualifications and occupations.

cards.title: ESCO
cards.content: ESCO is the multilingual European classification of skills, competences, qualifications and occupations. ESCO functions as a dictionary describing, identifying and classifying professions, skills and qualifications relevant for the EU labour market and education and training.

cards.title: Competencies
cards.content: Competences are the knowledge, aptitudes, and abilities that can be applied in an occupational context. ESCO distinguishes between competences/skills and knowledge, and between transversal and occupation-specific competences/skills and knowledge.

cards.title: Qualifications
cards.content: Qualifications are the formal outcome of an assessment and validation process obtained when a competent authority establishes that an individual has achieved learning outcomes corresponding to given standards.
